briefTitle: A Study to Assess the Effect of Exenatide Treatment on Mean 24-Hour Heart Rate in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
officialTitle: A Study to Assess the Effect of Exenatide Treatment on Mean 24-Hour Heart Rate in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
summary: This study will explore the effect of exenatide (given twice a day) versus placebo (given twice a day) treatment on change in mean 24-hour heart rate over a 12 week period of drug exposure in patients with type 2 diabetes.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in Mean 24-hour Heart Rate From Baseline to Endpoint
